DOC.detailed_description: The clinical daily routine indicate slow rate administration propofol lead reduction 50 % dose propofol require achieve onset clinical endpoint anesthesia ( i.e . loss consciousness ) titrate effect . Therefore , conclude slow injection require small dose propofol grade effect weaken fast injection . This conclusion contradict pharmacologic consideration , fast injection would lead high peak concentration consequence , high peak effect effect side , brain . The present study design measure Electroencephalogram ( EEG ) peak effect propofol bolus ( 2 mg/kg ) inject different infusion rate . Although know propofol cardiovascular effect , influence injection rate cardiovascular change less clear . Others find fast injection rate propofol cause great reduction blood pressure . Other similar study show difference blood pressure different injection rate . An additional aim study therefore investigate influence different injection rate hemodynamic parameter .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) physical status 13 schedule elective surgery general anesthesia . Exclusion criterion : emergency surgery obesity indication rapid sequence induction drug affect central nervous system history alcohol drug abuse neurological psychiatric disease contraindication use propofol
